mapper.insert: insert into nba_player (countryEn, teamName, birthDay, country, teamCityEn, code, displayAffiliation, displayName, schoolType, teamConference, teamConferenceEn, weight, teamCity, playYear, jerseyNo, teamNameEn, draft, displayNameEn, birthDayStr, heightValue, position, age, playerId) values (#{countryen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamcityen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayaffiliation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schooltype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamconference,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamconferenceen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{playyear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jerseyno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamnameen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{draft,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{displaynameen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthdaystr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{heightvalue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{playerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update nba_player set countryEn = #{countryen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teamName = #{teamname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthDay = #{birthday,jdbcType=BIGINT}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teamCityEn = #{teamcityen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, displayAffiliation = #{displayaffiliation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, displayName = #{displayname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, schoolType = #{schooltype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teamConference = #{teamconference,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teamConferenceEn = #{teamconferenceen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teamCity = #{teamcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, playYear = #{playyear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jerseyNo = #{jerseyno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teamNameEn = #{teamnameen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, draft = #{draft,jdbcType=INTEGER}, displayNameEn = #{displaynameen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthDayStr = #{birthdaystr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, heightValue = #{heightvalue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, position = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, playerId = #{playerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, countryEn, teamName, birthDay, country, teamCityEn, code, displayAffiliation, displayName, schoolType, teamConference, teamConferenceEn, weight, teamCity, playYear, jerseyNo, teamNameEn, draft, displayNameEn, birthDayStr, heightValue, position, age, playerId from nba_player where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
